plot: Based on Louis Cha's classic swordsplay novel, this mega production stars Taiwanese heartthrob Ma Jingtao as a Legendary swordsman and MediaCorp's top actress Fann Wong as his love interest...
plot_en: Based on Louis Cha's classic swordsplay novel, this mega production stars Taiwanese heartthrob Ma Jingtao as a Legendary swordsman and MediaCorp's top actress Fann Wong as his love interest...
plot_es: Based on Louis Cha's classic swordsplay novel, this mega production stars Taiwanese heartthrob Ma Jingtao as a Legendary swordsman and MediaCorp's top actress Fann Wong as his love interest...
title: Xiao ao jiang hu
